data.event: Prior to its incorporation in 1840, the area was settled c.
1810 and known as the Territory of Indian Stream.

event.title: defined (ambiguously) the border in the Treaty of Paris of 1783

data.event: The western edge of Pittsburg is defined by Halls Stream, being the "northwesternmost headwaters of the Connecticut River", which defined (ambiguously) the border in the Treaty of Paris of 1783.
